channel.title: Java Client problem help please
channel.description: I have a server and some people are unable to connect to the server due to there java being outdated (don't say to update cause they can't) they have an older version of OS X so they can't update there java further than it already is so I'd like to make it so it works for any version of java that you have regardless of what java I compiled the client with. Thanks!

item.title: Java Client problem help please
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

I have a server and some people are unable to connect to the server due to there java being outdated (don’t say to update cause they can’t) they have an older version of OS X so they can’t update there java further than it already is so I’d like to make it so it works for any version of java that you have regardless of what java I compiled the client with. Thanks!
